author: Special Correspondent
text:
Passport camp

The Regional Passport Office will conduct a special passport camp on January 28 for Haj pilgrims. The Inspector General of Police (South Zone) and other police officials will participate in the camp to be conducted at the RPO, Bharathi Ula Road, Race Course, Madurai 625002. Haj pilgrims, whose applications are either pending with the RPO or the police, can attend the camp to get the defects rectified for speedy despatch of passports.
title: Special passport camp
